text: Kandi mujye mugaragira Allah, ntimukamubangikanye n’icyo ari cyo cyose; mujye mugirira neza ababyeyi, abo mufitanye isano, impfubyi, abakene, umuturanyi mufitanye isano, umuturanyi usanzwe, inshuti ya hafi, uri ku rugendo n’abacakara banyu. Mu by’ukuri, Allah ntakunda umunyagasuzuguro, umwibone
